# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than what others have paid, but I'm willing to make it accessible to you. I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects its true value while offering you a great deal. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer
